org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.jdbc.writer.deprecated
Interface IStatementConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStatementConverter, StatementConverter
Deprecated. Use (implementations of) ISQLWriter instead

public interface IStatementConverter

Converts some data into a PreparedStatement.

Author:
perryj
See Also:
JDBCWriteConnector

Method Detail

initialise

public void initialise(java.sql.Connection connection)
Deprecated. 
Do any initialisation required. Called with a valid connection once before convert is called. Calling this method again should reset and state.

Parameters:
connection -

convert

public java.sql.PreparedStatement convert(java.lang.Object data,
                                          java.sql.Connection connection)
Deprecated. 
Convert data into a fully resolved PreparedStatement

Returns:
fully resolved PreparedStatement

validate

public void validate(java.util.List exceptions,
                     Component comp)
Deprecated. 
Checks that the properties for the statement converter are valid. If any problems are found then an exception is raised and added to the supplied list.

Parameters:
exceptions - list of exceptions that any validation errors will be appended to
comp - the component that this converter is connected to. We need to pass this as any exceptions raised require it as part of their constructor!

preparedStatementIsReusable

public boolean preparedStatementIsReusable()
Deprecated. 
Indicates whether returned PreparedStatement (from convert) can be reused multiple times. Default is false. It should return true if, for example a prepared statement is to be reused multiple times.

Returns:
false if ps must be closed each time
